companies.name: Electra
companies.location: 104, Rue de Richelieu, Paris, Île-de-France 75002, FR
companies.description: Electra is a european charge point operator. Fast charging network across 9 countries. Member of French Tech Next 40. Partners: Vinci Autoroutes, Stellantis, G7, AccorInvest, Altarea, Indigo, Louvre Hotels Group, Delhaize Group.
companies.notes: Top-tier company, French Tech Next 40, massive expansion (15k charging points by 2030), major partnerships

companies.name: IZI by EDF
companies.description: Filiale EDF - Solutions clé en main d'installation de bornes de recharge. Leader du marché français avec accompagnement personnalisé.
